txt.en: The enemy is assaulting the peak of the gate-house. Protect the Hornburg!
'So here we find ourselves, standing at the threshold of destruction.'
'On this day, the strength of Man shall be tested, and while we may bend, we will not break!'
'We shall not fall. Not on this day! This day, we stand. This day, we fight for the dawn!'
<rgb=#00FF00>The gate to the Hornburg has been protected!</rgb>
The Hornburg - Solo
Goblins are constructing winches to raise ladders above the gate-house! Prevent them from quickly raising more allies!
<rgb=#FF0000>The tower has been overrun!</rgb>
'Now is the time when we show them the resolve of Man. Dawn is nearly here.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The catapult has been secured!</rgb>
'Th√©oden-king! Gandalf is nearly here! Let us ride out and meet him!'
The enemy is placing large siege ladders against the catapult tower! Bring them down quickly!
The portcullis gate above the gate-house refuses to close. Defend the men working to repair and close the gate!
'We are battered and bruised. Our catapults are damaged. Our number is small.'
<rgb=#FF0000>The portcullis slams shut, locked until it can be repaired!</rgb>
You must have completed the 'Glittering Caves' battle.
An enemy battering ram is threatening to break through the gate! Descend through the gate-house and destroy the machine before it succeeds.
<rgb=#FF0000>The wounded within the gate-house have been defeated!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The mechanisms are repaired and the tower-room secured!</rgb>
Aragorn's voice calls out, 'They are thinning. We will soon have a break. Make the best of it!'
<rgb=#00FF00>The winches have been thrown down and the wounded are safe!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The barricades have fallen! The Hornburg is vulnerable!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The doorway to the Hornburg has been smashed!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The bridge to the Hornburg has been defended!</rgb>
Aragorn's voice rings out, 'The enemy marches upon us once more!'
